# Overview 
:::

The Plant Protein Supplier (PPS) Survey captures benchmark data from the plant protein ingredient and equipment sectors. Each quarter, the survey delivers valuable insights into the industryâ€™s status and outlook, providing essential information for policymakers, investors, and other stakeholders. For companies operating in the plant protein sector, this survey is an indispensable tool offering empirical guidance on strategic business planning.

The PPS Survey is made possible through funding from the European Union's [HORIZON EUROPE](https://research-and-innovation.ec.europa.eu/funding/funding-opportunities/funding-programmes-and-open-calls/horizon-europe_en) research and innovation programme under grant agreement [No 101059632](https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/opportunities/projects-details/43108390/101059632/HORIZON).

# Data

Aggregate data from the PPS Survey are published on the [Industry Data Portal](/data/index.qmd).
